page.description: Specify the Javascript code to execute when the slider is dropped at a new position.

section.description:
Like the onSlide event property, the onChange event also eliminates the need for defining an event handler inside of an Javascript function. This makes the slider more consistent with how event handlers for other controls (e.g. Switch, ButtonList, List, etc) are defined, as the code for the event handlers can be added directly to the property.
